pullrequest.title: Workaround for race condition when setting model scale

content.html:
I was able to reproduce the race condition occasionally with the following patch:

diff -r cf962dda2966 gazebo/physics/Link.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/Link.cc    Wed Jan 08 17:49:06 2020 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/physics/Link.cc    Wed Jan 08 17:57:54 2020 -0800
@@ -1068,6 +1068,8 @@
     msgs::Light *lightMsg = _msg.add_light();
     light->FillMsg(*lightMsg);
   }
+  gzerr << "Link::FillMsg MSleep(15)" << std::endl;
+  common::Time::MSleep(15);
 }

 //////////////////////////////////////////////////

on gazebo9 with this patch, it fails with complaints about the scale, but one of the links is also missing from the model message. with this branch and that patch, I don't see any errors
